name: Deep in the Pipe
description:
This is a game for Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam.

You are a man falling high from the top of the pipe and you have to dodge the walls and the laser to prevent the player from losing

This game needs good reflexes and the speed of the falling will be increasing with time.

IMPORTANT*

The controls

are WASD

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTs TO RUN THIS GAME*

any dual-core or higher processor

minimum 3 GB of ram but 4GB recommended

and any integrated GPU

This game includes 6 levels

NOTE * 

This game was made in only 3 days

so it will have a ton of bugs and glitches

THANK YOU.........
